fxInfo_clarification: The variable evaluates the extent of state control over travel, choice of residence, employment or institution of higher education; the right of citizens to own property and establish private businesses; the private businessâ€™ freedom from unduly influence by government offcials, security forces, political parties or organized crime; gender equality, freedom of choice of marriage partners and size of family; equality of opportunity and absence of economic exploitation.
fxInfo_sources: Freedom House (2018). Taken from Teorell et al (2018).
